name: my-playwright-project
description: Playwright 테스트 프로젝트 - Eterno Hub, Studio, App 자동화

scripts.test:hub:debug: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js hub debug
scripts.test:hub:debug:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js hub debug
scripts.test:hub:debug:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev node scripts/run-platform-test.js hub debug
scripts.test:hub:debug:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js hub debug
scripts.test:studio:debug: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js studio debug
scripts.test:studio:debug:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js studio debug
scripts.test:studio:debug:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev node scripts/run-platform-test.js studio debug
scripts.test:studio:debug:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js studio debug
scripts.test:app:debug: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js app debug
scripts.test:app:debug:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js app debug
scripts.test:app:debug:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev node scripts/run-platform-test.js app debug
scripts.test:app:debug:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa node scripts/run-platform-test.js app debug
scripts.playwright:hub: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/hub/ --ui
scripts.playwright:hub:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/hub/ --ui
scripts.playwright:hub:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/hub/ --ui
scripts.playwright:hub:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa npx playwright test tests/hub/ --ui
scripts.playwright:studio: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/studio/ --ui
scripts.playwright:studio:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/studio/ --ui
scripts.playwright:studio:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/studio/ --ui
scripts.playwright:studio:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa npx playwright test tests/studio/ --ui
scripts.playwright:app: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/app/ --ui
scripts.playwright:app:qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/app/ --ui
scripts.playwright:app:dev: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=dev npx playwright test tests/app/ --ui
scripts.playwright:app:release-qa: cross-env ETERNAL_ENV=release-qa npx playwright test tests/app/ --ui
